name: Climb (itch) (Niwala)
description:
Climb Find your path to the top of the mountain!

______________________________________________________

Game created for the VRJAM
Done with Oculus Rift. Haven't tested other VR headsets.

All the graphic assets have been made for the Jam.
With the help of Maxime Vermeulen for some props.

______________________________________________________

Controls :

Use your joystick to change the shape of your tool.
Use the trigger to extend your ice axe.
The pulley works like a Beyblade launcher. Move your hands away from each other to move.
